cab.content: R g T.274BATTLE SITUATION - NOON- 7th OCTOBER, 1918,WESTERN FRONT. British Front,North of the SCaRPE in a small operation we took BIACHE ST. VAaST this morning. French Front.North east of REIMS the French have advanced their line to the general line of the RIVER SUIPPES between BETHENIVILLE and AGUILCOURT, and have crossed this river and taken the village of BERTICOURT,North of ST, QUENTIN they have captured MORECOURT, TILLOY FARM, REIv&UCOURT and LBSDINS. MACEDONIAN FRONT.In ALBANIA Italian cavalry hava reached the left hank of the SKUMBI and are fighting enemy detachments defending bridges at NOVA and TENASAI. Parties of infantry are advancing up the DEVOLI VALLEY and pressing on the middle SKUMBI and EL BASAN.The French are pushing west beyond DIBRA and along the SL BASAN road,In SERBIA the Serbians have driven back the Austrians who are retiring northwards in disorder, and have entered VRANJE,PALESTINE FRONT,There is nothing to report..General Staff,War Office, S.W.1, 7th October, 1918.Issued at 12,40 p,m.
